overview: We have come to the conclusion at BDF that it helps to have beauty on both sides of the camera, so we gave the boys of BDF the cameras and the directing reigns. Its "Have Fun Boys" see you later, and boy did they go nuts When those boys started pulling out their big dicks and turned the cameras on each other the results were amazing. Just think of stripping and being filmed by a big dicked boystud and you'll understand the excitement. Justin Slater made this wonderful documentary from the casting stages into a hot three-way with Donnie Ross, himself, and Tommy Young down to the wet shots and the towels. Steve Vanila directed an additional sequence with Donavin Fitch and him, filming him, fucking him at the same time. It's not easy to fuck and film to the same rhythm, try it. This is probably the most unique BigDikFactory video and we are very proud to share it with you. Enjoy!
title: Young Directors
